metadata.title: CVE-2022-31746 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Internal URLs are protected by a secret UUID key, which could have beenleaked to web page through the Referrer header. This vulnerability affectsFirefox for iOS < 102.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
